profile.summary: I am a backend-focused web developer with over {experience} years of hands-on experience building and maintaining scalable, high-performance web systems â€” from simple tools to complex microservice architectures. I take full ownership of my work, supporting both new projects and existing codebases developed by others. I am passionate about clean code, system reliability, and continuous improvement, always aiming to deliver robust, long-term solutions that align with business goals.

experience.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Leading backend development of a core microservice within a complex event support system for international sports events
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth integration across a distributed microservice ecosystem and occasional legacy monolith components
Taking part in the development of other microservices across the company, ensuring shared technical standards and code quality

experience.title: Backend Developer
experience.company: Tonic Health, Chicago IL, USA (Fully Remote)
responsibilities: Worked on a healthcare system that operated on multiple microservices and employed diverse data storages, caching, and logging systems
Developed and implemented scalable architecture, enabling efficient communication and seamless integration between various system components
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, analyze user needs, and deliver solutions that aligned with healthcare industry standards and regulations

experience.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Support of high-loaded complicated video streaming system
Integration partner systems via API
Creation of auxiliary logic for processing complex business entities

experience.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Integrated legacy system core with newly created microservices
Maintenance of complicated loaded game platform, including production deployment
Developed SPA app for game platform administration (Vue.js, Symfony, Docker)
Developed Selenium based UI testing framework, available to work with canvas html5 pages (Docker, Selenium WebDriver, PHPUnit, MockServer)

experience.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Created and maintained different projects, based on Yii2 extended framework platform
API refactoring
Developed booking system from scratch

experience.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Working with different API's such as PayPal, PayU, Telegram, etc.
Creating company's own API
Working with payment systems, using OAuth protocol

experience.title: Web Software Developer

responsibilities: Developing software for online Hotel Management System
Server-side programming using PHP MVC pattern, PostgreSQL DB

Creating automation tests using Selenium Web Driver with Python
Developing Deterministic Finite Automaton as part of the system
